metadata.title: AI Dialogue Generator - Create Realistic Character Conversations
metadata.description: Generate engaging, realistic dialogue between characters with our free AI dialogue generator. Perfect for screenwriters, novelists, game developers, and creative writers.
metadata.keywords: AI dialogue generator, character dialogue, conversation generator, screenplay dialogue, novel dialogue, creative writing tool

ui.title: AI Dialogue Generator
ui.subtitle: Create compelling, realistic conversations between characters with AI

placeholders.scenario_prompt: Describe the scenario or context for the dialogue... (e.g., 'Two old friends meet after 10 years at a coffee shop')
placeholders.setting: e.g., A dimly lit bar in 1920s Chicago

output.title: Generated Dialogue
output.empty_message: Your generated dialogue will appear here

validation.enter_scenario: Please enter a scenario or context
validation.add_characters: Please add at least 2 characters with names

errors.generation_failed: Failed to generate dialogue. Please try again.

random_prompts: Two strangers stuck in an elevator during a power outage discover they have a surprising connection
A detective interrogates a suspect who claims to have an alibi that's impossible to verify
A parent and adult child have a long-overdue conversation about a family secret
Two rival business owners are forced to work together during a crisis
A time traveler tries to convince someone from the past about the future without revealing too much
Former best friends reunite at a funeral and confront unresolved issues

feature1.label: Features
feature1.title: What is AI Dialogue Generator
feature1.description: Our AI Dialogue Generator uses advanced language models to create natural, engaging conversations between characters. Whether you're writing a screenplay, novel, game, or any creative project, this tool helps you craft authentic dialogue that brings your characters to life.

items.title: Multi-Character Support
items.description: Create dialogues with multiple characters, each with their own distinct personality and voice.

items.title: Customizable Tone & Style
items.description: Choose from various dialogue types and tones to match your story's mood perfectly.

items.title: Narrative Integration
items.description: Optionally include narrative descriptions to set scenes and convey character emotions.

feature2.label: Benefits
feature2.title: Why Use AI Dialogue Generator
feature2.description: Save time and enhance your creative writing with AI-powered dialogue generation

items.title: Overcome Writer's Block
items.description: When you're stuck on a conversation scene, let AI generate initial dialogue that you can refine and personalize.

items.title: Consistent Character Voices
items.description: Define character personalities and the AI maintains their unique speaking styles throughout the dialogue.

items.title: Rapid Prototyping
items.description: Quickly generate multiple versions of a scene to explore different directions for your story.

feature3.label: How to Use
feature3.title: How to Use Our AI Dialogue Generator
feature3.description: Follow these simple steps to generate natural, character-driven dialogue in minutes.

items.title: Describe the scenario
items.description: Enter the scene context and add at least two characters with names, personalities, and roles.

items.title: Choose style & tone
items.description: Pick a dialogue type, tone, and length. Optionally add setting and narration for richer scenes.

items.title: Generate & refine
items.description: Click Generate Dialogue, then copy and edit the result to match your story’s voice.

feature.name: dialogue-who-uses
feature.label: Who Uses
feature.title: Who Uses AI Dialogue Generator
feature.description: Built for creators who need believable character voices—fast.

items.title: Screenwriters
items.description: Draft scenes, punch up banter, and explore alternate takes without losing character consistency.

items.title: Novelists & Fiction Writers
items.description: Create authentic dialogue that matches personality, relationships, and the emotional arc of a chapter.

items.title: Game Developers & RPG Designers
items.description: Prototype quest conversations, NPC interactions, and branching dialogue quickly for iteration.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: AI dialogue generator FAQs
faq.description: Common questions about our AI Dialogue Generator

items.title: What types of dialogue can I generate?
items.description: You can generate various types including casual conversations, arguments, interviews, negotiations, confessions, comedic exchanges, dramatic scenes, and philosophical discussions.

items.title: How many characters can I include?
items.description: You can add as many characters as you need. Each character can have a name, personality traits, and role defined to help the AI create distinct voices.

items.title: Can I use the generated dialogue commercially?
items.description: Yes, all dialogue generated by our tool is yours to use for any purpose, including commercial projects like novels, screenplays, and games.

items.title: What languages are supported?
items.description: We support multiple languages including English, Chinese, German, Korean, Japanese, and Russian. The AI will generate dialogue in your selected language.

items.title: How do I get the best results?
items.description: Provide detailed character descriptions, a clear scenario, and choose the appropriate dialogue type and tone. The more context you give, the better the output.

items.title: Is this a free AI dialogue generator?
items.description: Yes. You can use the AI Dialogue Generator for free without signing in. If we introduce usage limits in the future, they will be clearly shown on the page.

cta.title: Start Creating Dialogue Now
cta.description: Transform your story ideas into compelling character conversations
